News.Title: TSMC Reports 35% Profit Jump, Plans Major Investment Boost
News.Summary: Taiwan's TSMC posted ₹1,32,400 crores net profit in Q4, up 35% YoY, driven by AI chip demand. The world's largest chipmaker plans to increase capital spending to $52-56 billion by 2026.

News.Title: TSMC Q4 revenue beats forecasts with 20.45% growth
News.Summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company's Q4 revenue reached $33.04 billion, exceeding analyst estimates of $32.72 billion, driven by AI demand and pre-tariff stockpiling orders.

News.Title: TSMC Eyes Advanced Chip Production in Japan Facility
News.Summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company is reportedly considering producing advanced semiconductors at its Japanese facility, according to Nikkei reports, marking potential expansion of high-end chip manufacturing capabilities.
